meta.title: Caverns of Eldreth - The Dark Lord's Rise
meta.author: Game System

start.title: Cave Entrance
start.description: The cave mouth yawns like a black tooth. Torches flicker on the walls. A weathered quest board stands nearby.

board.text: The board mentions bandits in the old ruins to the east.

enter.text: You carefully step into the cave...

inspect.text: You find a rusty sword near the entrance!

wait.text: You wait patiently. A gust reveals a hidden footprint.

camp.title: Rangers' Camp
camp.description: A small ranger outpost. A ranger offers a map and a lead to the Old Ruins.

talk.text: A ranger gives a tip about bandit patrols and a small reward if you help.

map.text: You receive a rough map pointing to the 'Old Ruins'.

leave.text: You head back to the cave entrance.

cavern.title: Gloom Cavern
cavern.description: Stalactites drip. A faint rumble echoes deeper in.

forward.text: You venture deeper into the cave...

search.text: You find 5 gold coins tucked in a crevice.

crossroads.title: Underground Crossroads
crossroads.description: Three tunnels meet here. Scraps of cloth and old bones suggest recent travelers.

north.text: A cold wind blows from the north. You move cautiously.

east.text: You head east into darker tunnels.

south.text: You go back to the cavern.

rest.text: You rest and recover a bit of health.

ruins_approach.title: Ruins Approach
ruins_approach.description: You see the crumbling stone of an old watchtower. Bandit voices carry on the wind.

sneak.text: You sneak closer and spot two bandit scouts.

charge.text: You charge forward and the bandits are alerted!

observe.text: You observe patrol patterns and find a weak point.

ruins_entry.title: Old Ruins
ruins_entry.description: Broken columns and collapsed roofs. This place reeks of lawlessness.

sneak.text: You slip between shadows and avoid some patrols.

treasure_room.title: Hidden Chamber
treasure_room.description: A small chamber hidden beneath rubble. A faint glimmer hints at treasure.

open.text: You open a chest and find a silver amulet.

trap.text: A trap springs! You take damage but salvage a blade.

deep_cave.title: Deep Cave
deep_cave.description: The air grows thick. Something moves in the dark.

advance.text: You advance and encounter a cave beast!

light.text: You light a stronger torch, revealing hidden details.

crystal_cave.title: Crystal Cave
crystal_cave.description: Glowing crystals illuminate this beautiful cavern. The air feels charged with ancient magic.

meditate.text: The crystal's energy restores your vitality.

leave.text: You return to the main cavern.

underground_lake.title: Underground Lake
underground_lake.description: A vast dark lake stretches before you. Ancient pillars rise from the depths.

swim.text: Something brushes past you in the water!

boat.text: You find an old boat and row to a small island.

return.text: You head back to drier ground.

dark_throne.title: Dark Throne
dark_throne.description: The Dark Lord awaits on his cursed throne. The air crackles with evil energy.

challenge.text: You challenge the Dark Lord to mortal combat!

banish.text: You attempt to use the collected artifacts to banish him.

bandit_ruins.title: Bandits in the Ruins
bandit_ruins.description: Clear the bandit presence in the Old Ruins and recover stolen goods.

lost_ranger.title: The Lost Ranger
lost_ranger.description: Find the missing ranger in the crystal caves.

cursed_amulet.title: The Cursed Amulet
cursed_amulet.description: Cleanse the cursed amulet at the lake shrine.
